What We Offer   Target Audience     Schedule Topics   Application & Enrollment Process   Portfolio Download   Start the Dialogue     Your Return on Investment Experience Stern   Our Faculty   The Data   Testimonials     Frequently Asked Questions   Contact Us                                 POWER YOUR POTENTIAL    The best minds in executive education are at NYU Stern School of Business.                  LEADERSHIP AND STRATEGY    Analyze your own potential for leadership and develop a personal leadership plan. Learn how to develop your own personal style, bring others on board and sustain your position in a competitive world.                  BUSINESS ANALYTICS AND MARKETING    Learn how analytics can better inform your decision-making and strategy formation. Learn to utilize digital marketing and social networks to drive innovation.                  FINANCE AND RISK MANAGEMENT    Gain a more global perspective in the field. Acquire the tools to interact effectively with financial managers. Learn to unlock secrets hidden in company balance sheets.                  Spotlight Box       A letter from Assistant Dean Naomi Diamant           Download Full Short Course Portfolio    Explore Course Offerings                     News    Tweets by @NYUSternExecEd              Our Application Process      We operate on a year-round rolling admissions basis and accept applications until the course is full.      However, we recommend all candidates apply at least one month in advance of the course start date in order to fully take advantage of time to review any pre-course academic materials.                Executive Education Spotlight On...    Digital Marketing and Social Media Strategy      This course will examine best-practices related to the business use of social media and digital marketing. While there will be sufficient attention given to top level strategy used by companies adopting social media and digital marketing, the course will also focus on digital analytics oriented tools: how to make organizations more intelligent in how they conduct business in the digital age. Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                              What Are Short Courses?      Executive Education courses at NYU Stern are designed for executives and high-potential managers to retool , advance and expand their tools and knowledge . NYU Stern’s world-class faculty and over 100 years of business education back up a promise that you will emerge from our programs better equipped to master the challenges and opportunities of both your corporate environment and the global marketplace.    Our short courses are two- to five-day open enrollment courses in various essential business topics of Leadership and Strategy, Business Analytics and Marketing, and Finance and Risk Management.                                  Overview     What Are Short Courses? Register Now        Request Information        Events                                                                                     Summer Intensives                           On This Page                                                 The NYU School of Professional Studies offers noncredit intensive programs that provide total immersion in subject matter over a protracted period of time. Intensive programs are offered throughout the year. Whether your goal is to excel in this competitive job market, to expand your overall marketability by mastering a new skill, or to embark on a journey of personal enlightenment, intensive programs at the School provide you with the tools and the knowledge base you need to succeed. Study options are available in a wide range of disciplines. Be sure to register early for these currently offered intensives as enrollment is limited and courses fill quickly!   An increasing number of intensives are offered throughout the year. However, the vast majority are offered during the summer. No matter when you choose to enroll in an intensive, you will find that the small class sizes, condensed formats, and convenient schedules provide a distinct advantage. Intensives allow you to immerse yourself in your studies and absorb a wealth of information in a short period of time. Hone your skills, broaden your horizons, and build your professional network, while studying on-site, online, or abroad.
